message:
[1;36m── STATEMENT AFTER EXPRESSION in tests/syntax-error/syntax-error-test.roc ──────[0m

I just finished parsing an expression with a series of definitions,

and this line is indented as if it's intended to be part of that
expression:

[1;36m1[0m[1;36m│[0m  [37mapp [main] { pf: platform "https://github.com/roc-lang/basic-cli/releases/download/0.12.0/Lb8EgiejTUzbggO2HVVuPJFkwvvsfW6LojkLR20kTVE.tar.br" }[0m
[1;36m2[0m[1;36m│[0m
[1;36m3[0m[1;36m│[0m  [37miMpOrT pf.Task exposing [Task][0m
[1;36m4[0m[1;36m│[0m
[1;36m5[0m[1;36m│[0m  [37mexpect 2 + 2 == 5[0m
    [1;31m^[0m

However, I already saw the final expression in that series of
definitions.
